name: Special Forces War - Zombie Attack
description:
• There are many scenes with zombies everywhere. Constantly challenge, accumulate experience and improve shooting accuracy;
  • Need to shoot and kill various zombies in dangerous battlefields;
  • Unlock levels of different difficulty to challenge, so that the battle will be more exciting.

Exciting game levels, constant challenges, exciting adventures, and more rewards.

There are many soldiers with different combat skills. Cleverly combined, the team will be stronger.

There are many kinds of zombies. They will attack in groups. You can't let zombies break through your defenses.

You must use flexible strategies to build your own defenses during combat.

The classic tower defense combat mode in the game makes the game more interesting.
